typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CreationDate as string,
		UserIds as string,
		Operations as string,
		AuditData as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(UserIds = UserIds,
		CreationDate = CreationDate,
		Operations = Operations,
		AuditData = AuditData,
		OperationsNew = concat(Operations, AuditData)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
